0.text: Innate: Periodically, upon taking  fatal damage, Anivia enters  resurrection for 6 seconds and restores all of her  health.

1.text: While under resurrection, Anivia is  unable to act and gains -40 − 20 (based on level)  bonus armor and  bonus magic resistance.

2.text: If Anivia remains alive by the end of the duration, she is revived with her current health.

0.text: Active: Anivia launches a chunk of ice in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit and  slows them by 20% − 40% (based on  Glacial Storm's Rank) for 3 seconds.

1.text: Flash Frost can be recast while the ice is in flight after its cast time, and does so automatically at maximum range.

2.text: Recast: Anivia shatters the ice, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and  stunning them for a duration, as well as refreshing the  slow.

0.text: Active: Anivia summons a wall of ice at the target location perpendicular to her facing,  knocking all units away from it, though not through terrain. The wall lingers as impassable terrain for 5 seconds.
Passive: Enemies hit by  Flash Frost or a fully formed  Glacial Storm become Chilled for 3 seconds, refreshing on subsequent hits.

1.text: Active: Anivia blasts a freezing wind at the target enemy that deals magic damage,  doubled if they were Chilled.

0.text: Active: Anivia calls forth a driving rain of ice and hail at the target location, dealing magic damage every 0.5 seconds to enemies within and  slowing them for 1 second, refreshing every 0.5 seconds while they remain inside.

1.text: The blizzard increases in size over 1.5 seconds. At maximum size, Glacial Storm is empowered to deal 300% damage and increase the effectiveness of its slow by 50%, which also instead lasts 1.5 seconds and refreshes every 0.25 seconds.

2.text: Glacial Storm can be recast after 1 second, and does so automatically if Anivia is no longer in range or unable to pay the  mana cost, or becomes affected by any form of  interrupting  crowd control.

3.text: Recast: Anivia ends Glacial Storm, dealing one last tick of damage.

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

Stats

+15 ability power
+70 health

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Focus: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.
Unique – Drain: Restore 1 mana every second, increased to 1.5 for 10 seconds when you damage an enemy champion. If you can't gain mana, heal 45% of this value instead.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – FOCUS: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against  minions.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Glaciate: Unleash a fan of icy shards in a cone in the target direction, dealing 100 (+ 30% AP) magic damage to all enemies hit and slowing them by 65% for 1 second. Enemies struck in the center of the cone are rooted for the same duration instead (30 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – GLACIATE: Unleash a fan of icy shards in a cone in the target direction, dealing 100 (+ 30% AP) magic damage to all enemies hit and  slowing them by 65% for 1 second. Enemies struck in the center of the cone are  rooted for the same duration instead (30 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 10 ability power.
passive.originText: MYTHIC PASSIVE: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 10 ability power.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+60 ability power
+200 health
+500 mana

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Awe: Grants ability haste equal to 0.5% bonus mana.
Unique – Mana Charge: Grants a charge every 8 seconds, up to 4 charges. Affecting an enemy or ally with an ability consumes a charge and grants 3 bonus mana, increased to 6 if it's a champion, up to a maximum of 360 bonus mana.
Transforms into Seraph's Embrace at +360 mana.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – AWE: Grants ability haste equal to 0.5% bonus mana.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Stasis: Put yourself in stasis for 2.5 seconds, rendering you untargetable and invulnerable for the duration but also unable to move, declare basic attacks, cast abilities, use summoner spells, or activate items (120 second cooldown).

origin.concerningText: The blizzard increases in size over 1.5 seconds. At maximum size, Glacial Storm is empowered to deal 300% damage and increase the effectiveness of its slow by 50%, which also instead lasts 1.5 seconds and refreshes every 0.25 seconds.

0.concerningText: Active: Anivia calls forth a driving rain of ice and hail at the target location, dealing magic damage every 0.5 seconds to enemies within and  slowing them for 1 second, refreshing every 0.5 seconds while they remain inside.

st_flatStats2.concerningText: Recast: Anivia shatters the ice, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and  stunning them for a duration, as well as refreshing the  slow.
